remarks: Closure of the group inverse operation on Dirichlet characters. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dchrmhm.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrmhm.b $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrn0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrn0.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Z ) $.
dchr1cl.o $e |- .1. = ( k e. B |-> if ( k e. U , 1 , 0 ) ) $.
dchrmulid2.t $e |- .x. = ( +g ` G ) $.
dchrmulid2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrinvcl.n $e |- K = ( k e. B |-> if ( k e. U , ( 1 / ( X ` k ) ) , 0 ) ) $.
dchrinvcl $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. D /\ ( K .x. X ) = .1. ) ) $.
$d B k $.
$d N k $.
$d U k $.
$d X k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
